entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who has been acting under the Imperius Curse and is described as clever and cunning. He is also shown to be avoiding Karkaroff.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as a person who knows Snape well and wants to keep that quiet. He is described as looking worried when talking to Snape.

relationships.description: Snape and Karkaroff have a relationship where Snape knows Karkaroff well, as mentioned by Ron.
Karkaroff talked to Snape in Potions class, and showed him something on his arm.
